transcript: I don't know what to say. I have no imagination and that's all I know to say to you. Well... God, I'm embarrassing you. I didn't want to do this here. I wanted to do it someplace different, someplace where we could be new to each other.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know what to say.  I have no imagination.  That's all I have to say to you.  God, I'm embarrassing you. I-I didn't want to do this here. I- I wanted to do it someplace different, someplace where we could be new to each other.
